Instrumental Variables

Author

Oliver Mork 

library(dagitty)
#> Warning: le package 'dagitty' a été compilé avec la version R 4.3.2
library(ggdag)
#> Warning: le package 'ggdag' a été compilé avec la version R 4.3.2
#> 
#> Attachement du package : 'ggdag'
#> L'objet suivant est masqué depuis 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     filter
library(ggplot2)
#> Warning: le package 'ggplot2' a été compilé avec la version R 4.3.2
model<- dagify(
  Y ~ D,
  Y ~ U,
  D ~ U,
  D ~ Z,
  exposure = "D",
  latent = "U",
  outcome = "Y",
  coords = list(x = c(U = 1, D = 0, Y = 2, Z = -1),
                y = c(U = 1, D = 0, Y = 0, Z = 0)),
  labels = c("D" = "Usage of new feature", 
             "Y" = "Time spent", 
             "U" = "willingness",
             "Z" = "EncouragementU")
)
ggdag(model, text = T) +
  guides(color = "none") +
  geom_dag_text(color = "white") +
  geom_dag_edges(edge_color = "black") +
  geom_dag_label_repel(aes(label = label))
rand_enc <- readRDS("rand_enc.rds")

model_biased <- lm(time_spent ~ used_ftr, data = rand_enc)
summary(model_biased)
#> 
#> Call:
#> lm(formula = time_spent ~ used_ftr, data = rand_enc)
#> 
#> Residuals:
#>      Min       1Q   Median       3Q      Max 
#> -20.4950  -3.5393   0.0158   3.5961  20.5051

#> Multiple R-squared:  0.497,  Adjusted R-squared:  0.497 
#> F-statistic:  9881 on 1 and 9998 DF,  p-value: < 2.2e-16
cor(rand_enc) %>% round(2)
#>            rand_enc used_ftr time_spent
#> rand_enc       1.00     0.20       0.13
#> used_ftr       0.20     1.00       0.71
#> time_spent     0.13     0.71       1.00
summary( lm(used_ftr ~ rand_enc, data = rand_enc))

#> Multiple R-squared:  0.497,  Adjusted R-squared:  0.497

library(tibble)
#> Warning: le package 'tibble' a été compilé avec la version R 4.3.2
library(ggplot2)
first_stage <- lm(used_ftr ~ rand_enc, data = rand_enc)
summary(first_stage)
#> 
#> Call:
#> lm(formula = used_ftr ~ rand_enc, data = rand_enc)
#> 
#> Residuals:
#>     Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
#> -0.5071 -0.3062 -0.3062  0.4929  0.6938 
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>             Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
#> (Intercept) 0.306164   0.006851   44.69   <2e-16 ***
#> rand_enc    0.200940   0.009624   20.88   <2e-16 ***
#> ---
#> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
#> 
#> Residual standard error: 0.4811 on 9998 degrees of freedom
#> Multiple R-squared:  0.04178,    Adjusted R-squared:  0.04169 
#> F-statistic:   436 on 1 and 9998 DF,  p-value: < 2.2e-16
pred_fs <- predict(first_stage)
pred_vs_actl <- tibble(
  pred = pred_fs,
  actl = rand_enc$used_ftr
)
ggplot(pred_vs_actl, aes(x = pred, y = actl, color = as.factor(actl))) +
  geom_jitter(alpha = .5) +
  scale_color_discrete(labels = c("Control Group", "Treatment Group")) +
    theme(legend.title = element_blank())
second_stage <- lm(rand_enc$time_spent ~ first_stage$fitted.values)
summary(second_stage)
#> 
#> Call:
#> lm(formula = rand_enc$time_spent ~ first_stage$fitted.values)
#> 
#> Residuals:
#>      Min       1Q   Median       3Q      Max 
#> -25.8757  -5.4714  -0.3263   5.3807  25.6541 
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>                           Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
#> (Intercept)                19.3124     0.3129   61.72   <2e-16 ***
#> first_stage$fitted.values   9.7382     0.7447   13.08   <2e-16 ***
#> ---
#> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
#> 
#> Residual standard error: 7.482 on 9998 degrees of freedom
#> Multiple R-squared:  0.01681,    Adjusted R-squared:  0.01672 
#> F-statistic:   171 on 1 and 9998 DF,  p-value: < 2.2e-16
library(estimatr)
#> Warning: le package 'estimatr' a été compilé avec la version R 4.3.2
model_iv <- iv_robust(time_spent ~ used_ftr | rand_enc, data = rand_enc)
summary(model_iv)
#> 
#> Call:
#> iv_robust(formula = time_spent ~ used_ftr | rand_enc, data = rand_enc)
#> 
#> Standard error type:  HC2 
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>             Estimate Std. Error t value  Pr(>|t|) CI Lower CI Upper   DF
#> (Intercept)   19.312     0.2248   85.89 0.000e+00   18.872    19.75 9998
#> used_ftr       9.738     0.5353   18.19 8.716e-73    8.689    10.79 9998
#> 
#> Multiple R-squared:  0.4921 ,    Adjusted R-squared:  0.492 
#> F-statistic:   331 on 1 and 9998 DF,  p-value: < 2.2e-16
